title.text: Three-quarters say they're comfortable going to the grocery store; few comfortable attending a party % of U.S. adults who say, given the current situation with the coronavirus outbreak, they feel doing each of the following

values: Going out to the grocery store
Visiting with a close friend or family member inside their home
Going to a hair salon or barbershop
Attending an indoor sporting event or concert
